name: dispatcharr
description: Dispatcharr automates torrent client selection for media downloads. It automatically assigns downloads to the best available clients based on rules, boosting performance for Sonarr, Radarr, or Lidarr setups.
features: Smart Client Selection: Automatically route downloads to best available client. Optimized performance.
Rule-Based Routing: Define custom logic for download assignment. Flexible automation.
Arr Integration: Works seamlessly with Sonarr, Radarr, and Lidarr. Enhanced media automation.
Load Balancing: Distribute downloads across multiple clients. Maximize throughput.
Performance Boost: Faster downloads through intelligent routing. Efficient resource usage.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over download management. Your automation, your rules.
